title: Introducing: mARQUIS cOMPRESSOR
body:
More than a touch of Jai Paul to these tracks from the currently elusive **mARQUIS cOMPRESSOR**.

Given the care with which he taken to conceal his identity, and craft a ‘personal brand’, there’s no doubt that he’s had previous experience within the music industry. Check out Columbia and Universal below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
